content: Marc Tommasi — Marc Tommasi Homepage Navigation next M. T. - Homepage » Marc Tommasi¶ Professor in Computer Science at Lille university. I am a member of CRIsTAL lab. I am the leader of the Magnet Team. Previously, I was a (founding) member of the Mostrare project team in INRIA Lille. My research interests are machine learning, structured prediction for trees and graphs. I have also studied tree automata and set constraints.
